item.title: I switched to windows!
item.description: #OMG it really happened. I switched to windows. After some twenty years of personal Mac use, I decided to switch. Now Iâ€™m not a complete noob to windows. I had my fair share of windows 98 trouble shooting back in the day. You know, the days where buying a new computer really meant getting a beige box with a DOS floppy, and finding a windows cd and drivers and solving al the problems associated with owning a computer.
